title: Bakery Men's Golf Shorts Stretch Quick Dry Flat Front Tech Performance Chino Shorts
features: High Stretch Golf Shorts Fabric: 62% Cotton, 35% Polyester, 3% Spandex
YKK Smooth & Durable Zipper with Button closure

【COMFORTABLE & BREATHABLE】: 62% cotton, comfortable breathable and moisture; 35% polyester, prevent color fading and being out of shape to make sure the bright vivid color and good shape; 3% spandex, offer stretch room for golf sports; golf shorts light quick dry breathable comfortable material makes you stay cool on the outdoors golf course when it heats up in hot summer.

【LIGHTWEIGHT & STRETCH】: Great soft and lightweight stretch material snug with lots of room to bend down enhances your range of motion. They feature moisture-wicking fabric for comfort and mobility as you sink putts.
【SUN-CONTROL】: UV protection keeps you on the course under the bright sun. These are great for casual or activewear, so you can wear them for the golf course, yard work, biking, walking, hiking.

【5 POCKETS】: Flat-front 5-pockets design, two deep side hands pockets, and one front coin pocket, two back practical pockets with button closure and YKK zipper fly that is very useful for storing valuables.

【COLORFUL GOLF SHORTS】: Available in 5 colors, Green, Grey, Navy, Orange, Royal Blue, it will be hard to pick just one color, comfortable and fashionable design not only for golf, but you can also wear it on casual.
description: Men's Golf Shorts Quick Dry Stretch Lightweight Classic Fit Golf Shorts with Pockets

The mens performance relaxed fit golf shorts are must have for any wardrobe - the 62% cotton, 35% polyester, 3% spandex stretch fabric features 50+ UPF sun protection and has a high stretch to it to keep you comfortable while on the golf course.
Classic Fit - A straight leg short with some ease through the thigh to ensure maximum comfort and freedom of movement during play.
